metadata.title: CVE-2018-19143 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 4.0.x before 4.0.33, 5.0.x before 5.0.31,and 6.0.x before 6.0.13 allows an authenticated user to delete files via amodified submission form because upload caching is mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19143` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.13-1
otrs2 - 6.0.13-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.13-1').
